description: Carve your way into the season with the Snowboard Targeted Cushion Piste Machine Over The Calf Socks. These over-the-calf snowboard socks feature our most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability, 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, and a Virtually Seamless toe for top-notch comfort. Plus, a unique Piste Machine design makes a statement on the slopes without sacrificing comfort.
name: Smartwool Snowboard Targeted Cushion Piste Machine Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 60% Merino Wool, 11% Nylon, 27% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane
